clusters.name: Unable to Determine Clusters - Missing Item Metadata
clusters.description: Cannot identify prerequisite chains, group into thematic clusters, or propose an ordered learning sequence without complete metadata (e.g., title, type, tags, technology, prerequisites, complexity) for each content item. The provided items only contained 'id' fields. All items are placed here as a single, unclassified group.

items.reason: Item could not be processed due to missing metadata. No thematic placement or ordering possible.
Item could not be processed due to missing metadata. No thematic placement or ordering possible.
